A little bit something about me .

Hi, there.
I'm Me-ann and I'm a web developer. I love coding. I like learning new technologies and building web applications from start to finish. I continue to challenge myself by constantly improving my expertise in web development. I want users to have a seamless experience whenever they visit the website that I build.

Google, YouTube and Stack overflow are my bestfriends whenever I'm debugging. They always have the answers! I might not always get it fast and right, but for sure, they always deliver.
